products.metadescription: Splash (blackout), code - roller blind soothing and luxurious, the cool grey splash (blackout) code adds a sense of tranquillity to any room. This shimmering blind is easy to clean making it a practical choice as well as a stylish one, not to mention the
products.productdescription: Soothing and luxurious, the cool grey splash (blackout) code adds a sense of tranquillity to any room. This shimmering blind is easy to clean making it a practical choice as well as a stylish one, not to mention the easy-rolling mechanism that it hangs from.Create a feeling of sanctuary in your bathroom by pairing with an all-white or pale grey scheme, and accessorising with pops of colour. The code will match most shades, with turquoise and green being popular options.

products.title: Splash (Blackout), Grey - Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash (blackout), grey - roller blind splash (blackout) grey combines an intricate texture with a swirling and free-flowing pattern to create a design that is sure to catch the eye. The combination of two different neutral stone shades says everything yo
products.productdescription: Splash (blackout) grey combines an intricate texture with a swirling and free-flowing pattern to create a design that is sure to catch the eye. The combination of two different neutral stone shades says everything you need to know about this unique approach to design. It's one that's sure to spark your creativity into life.As you recreate your space you want to give some thought to how you'll manage the light as it enters your room. If you can find matching textures and finishes that dance with the light in a dozen different ways then your decor will really come to life.

products.title: Splash (Blackout), Pure - Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash (blackout), pure - roller blind the beautiful white and shimmering accents of the splash (blackout) pure work together to create a pretty and clean blackout blind. A generous and wipe-clean fabric carries this attractive pattern, and is easily roll
products.productdescription: The beautiful white and shimmering accents of the splash (blackout) pure work together to create a pretty and clean blackout blind. A generous and wipe-clean fabric carries this attractive pattern, and is easily rolled and unrolled at leisure.Use the pure in the bathroom for a fresh and spotless look, and complement with silver fixtures and fittings, adding in the occasional splash of blue or turquoise if bold colours are your preference. Alternatively, try a similar theme in the kitchen, this time accenting with muted greens or terracottas.

products.title: Splash Vine Green Panel Blind
products.metadescription: Splash vine green panel blind in green. Made to measure from 36.61 with free uk mainland delivery. This panel blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their moisture-resistant splash vine green panel blinds have a stylish and modern feel that will update any space. The lush green panel is a beautiful, contemporary colour which will brighten, and enrich the space with its calming, saturated shade. 
 
As panel blinds reach a massive 5 metres width and 3,.5 metres drop, this makes it one of the largest blinds we make. A popular blind for large windows and doors, or as a modern room-divider, this blind is not only durable but versatile by design. 
 
Panel blinds add a really modern feel to any space and at swift direct blinds, when purchasing this blind you will also be able to take advantage of their free 5 year guarantee, which means investing in a piece that will stand the test of time.  
 
 Product id: db-pan0218 fabric colour: vine green material: 100% polyester headrail: white aluminium 5 channel track   control type: cord or wand energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes

products.metadescription: Splash (blackout), code - loft blind made from tight woven pvc fabric, these blackout skylight blinds are perfect for your bathroom or rooms with a lot of humidity. With many great colours to choose from, you can easily find something to suit your bathroo
products.productdescription: Made from tight woven pvc fabric, these blackout skylight blinds are perfect for your bathroom or rooms with a lot of humidity.
